definition: tongue/CL:個|个[ge4]/enemy soldier captured for the purpose of extracting information
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I've Just Bitten My Tongue "Are we poisonous?"
sentences.chinese: 我刚咬破自己的舌头“我们有毒吗？”

sentences.english: Extending your tongue helps flatten the back of your tongue.
sentences.chinese: 伸展舌头可以让你的舌头变平。

sentences.english: Extending your tongue helps flatten the back of your tongue.
sentences.chinese: 伸展舌头可以让你的舌头变平。

sentences.english: Extend your tongue as far as possible to the corner of your mouth while pressing against a tongue depressor.
sentences.chinese: 向嘴角伸长你的舌头顶住压舌器。

sentences.english: Miles grinned and shook his head while clicking his tongue against his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 迈尔斯摇着头咧开嘴笑了，用舌头敲着牙齿。

sentences.english: His tongue is black, like Philibert's.
sentences.chinese: 他的舌头呈现黑色，和菲利布特一样。

sentences.english: Gusseted tongue keeps debris in its natural habitat.
sentences.chinese: 插角舌头保持在其自然栖息地的碎片。

sentences.english: The lungs' taste receptors do differ from tongue taste buds.
sentences.chinese: 肺部的味觉感受体和舌头的味蕾确实不同。

sentences.english: In the second century Galen pinned it on a dryness of the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 二世纪时，盖伦将口吃归咎于舌头干燥。

sentences.english: Have you ever put your tongue on cold metal so that it got stuck?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有把舌头放在冷金属上导致它转筋？

sentences.english: Slurping noodles is not entirely for the sake of politeness, but also to avoid having a burnt tongue.
sentences.chinese: 吸溜面条不但是为礼貌，而且还为了避免烫伤舌头。

sentences.english: So though it is still touching the teeth, it comes back like that.
sentences.chinese: 所以说虽然舌头仍然触及牙齿，它却是在向后移动。

sentences.english: Every time before he killed a cow, he cut out its tongue and ate it with liquor.
sentences.chinese: 每次他杀牛之前，他都会把牛的舌头割下来下酒。

sentences.english: You trust, the not dares to chew a tongue.
Cuddy : I get your point, I'll be more careful with my tongue in the future.
sentences.chinese: 我明白你意思了，我以后会更小心的管住“舌头”的。

sentences.english: He sat down to lap the soup with his long pink tongue.
sentences.chinese: 他坐下来用他那粉红色的长舌头舔那碗汤。

definition: mouth/CL:張|张[zhang1]/slap in the face/CL:個|个[ge4]
